title: Defeat the Duergar Intruders
content:
Drow seeking the Adamantine Forge and the one responsible for summoning the Spectator that petrified Dhourn. If the player did not pass any of the skill checks to reveal the true nature of the book looted off his body they can ask him about the book, prompting him to explain that a magical illusion has been placed on it.

Quests in Baldur's Gate 3 Acquire the Gauntlets for Helsik ♦ Aid the Underduke ♦ Ask the Goblin Priestess for Help ♦ Avenge Glut's Circle ♦ Avenge the Drowned ♦ Avenge the Hag
